name: Da Capo: Feroce of origin
description:
!! Alert !!

This game is not translated into English. 

We recommend playing only those who know Korean well.

Summary

It's a prologue story about a warrior named "Morrendo" fighting to revive her love.

Introduce

This is an entry for "1 Map 1 Chicken RPG Maker Contest."
It's a short turn-off RPG game. It is made up of about four battles.
Playtime: Approximately 10 to 15 minutes
